Articles.Content:
So i decided to try and make as close a replica to Skylab as i could and i think it came out rather well tbh. But ill let you decide =P

Ive added a .craft file but your gonna need a few mods. Mechjeb, Kosmos, Novapunch, Truss pack, Down Under Aerospace, Tiberdyne. If you\'ve got those mods then enjoy, if not then you should get them cause they are awesome

edit: forgot to mention this id for 0.16
Good, though the panels beneath the windmill-like set of SP\'s are too big.

Good, though the panels beneath the windmill-like set of SP\'s are too big.

And its orbiting the Mun.

And its orbiting the Mun.

yeah but why stop at Kerbin, thats no fun lol
Looks great! By any chance are there any other mods you\'re using? When I try to load the craft file I get an error telling me it can\'t find 'basekitSideMount' and not sure what that\'s from.

yeah but why stop at Kerbin, thats no fun lol

hey right, why stop at kerbin?^^

if I had the mod, I would download it, but I want to play with as much as possible without them, just parts which are not (yet) in the game.

Want a Space Station or a Satelite where I just need this one Mod^^
Holy crap this thread is old!
That's true! There are a lot of very old threads out there, but please don't post in old threads unless you have something to add to them, thanks
